title: Wild card shaco price/Date
body:
Cant wait for the skin to come out. Does anyone know when its coming out and how much its going to cost?

Thanks for all your responses. I got the skin

replies.body: He'll be 750 RP. We don't announce release dates in advance, but he'll be out later this patch. :]

It's been more than 4 years now. 
When can we expect you to make Bloodmoon, Project and Hextech Shaco??
Shaco's one of the first 3 champions who you think of when you look at the Bloodmoon skins... Yet you give it to champions who make no sense having one... 

A Robot Shaco in Project would be one of the coolest skins. 

And an even cooler robot Shaco from Hextech would be the best skin in the game...
Monday right? Am I right? Tell me I'm right.
Well i hope it is monday cause thats when i get back from vacation lol.
Lol it's Today. It'll be here when you get back! :D
Thank you very much for responding!. Thank you very much for making that skin i main shaco and was wanting a good skin to come out. and im thrilled about this one. EPIC!
Monday, Katey said I was right.

I like the skin, but we need a legendary one this skin is cool and all, but the effects and movements are all the same as they have been for years. The only real good new change to shaco is the Masked shaco with a new dance and effects. I'd like a real legendary shaco with new everything.
Ya i agree. i just wont buy masked shaco i dont like that skin at all. But im glad that they have a really cool looking skin for him now.
Since Lux was just released this week I would assume the Card theme skins will be released next week!
